inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: randomized to receive one of the rifapentine treatment regimens

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: willingness to be sampled 6 times during 1 PK sampling session and 2 - 3 times during another PK sampling session at an outpatient clinic, a clinical research center, or a hospital

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: written informed consent given for the Study 31 PK/PD study

exclusion.criterion: Hematocrit < 25% most recent value, measured within 30 days before PK/PD study
exclusion.label: unknown
